Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Kowloong', 2: 'November 10, 05:35', 4: 'Before the Huaxu reset and the full-sector self-check in the Tabula Akasha data layer', 5: '1200m under Kowloong, Physical Layer of Tabula Akasha'}
{1: '"These were the longest thirty-eight minutes of my life."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"It took the scientists thirty-three minutes to begin the Huaxu reset and complete the preparations."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"During those thirty-three minutes, the living and the dead coexisted."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"The problem was, when they finished preparing to reset Huaxu,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'no one could make the final decision, and no one could pull the final trigger."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"Because once Huaxu was reset, it would expose all of Tabula Akasha\'s data to the Punishing Virus."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"Leaving everything in Kowloong, all that remained, defenseless for those five minutes."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"We don\'t want others to decide our fate; the people of Kowloong will take fate into our own hands."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"And just at that moment, something unexpected happened..."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory865.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'No way! Absolutely not!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "You're not completely sure about this. And remember, we're still inside the Tabula Akasha. If we expose all our systems to the enemy, it's like walking right into a trap.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "So what? You think you can survive on your own? You're outnumbered.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "There's another issue. If, like 【kuroname】 mentioned, an external signal has already infiltrated Huaxu, will resetting Huaxu fix that problem?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The intruder could even reverse-engineer the Mind Beacon of 【kuroname】 using Huaxu. If 【kuroname】 hadn't been able to resist Huaxu's control, we wouldn't even be here discussing this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'But the conclusion is... "he" is here.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Zavier's voice tinged with disappointment, as if he felt betrayed."}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'And I\'ve already said, "he" isn\'t just some simple malicious code.', 4: '2'}

{3: 'After analyzing the Huaxu network packets intercepted by Asimov and comparing them with the recent attacks on Gestalt, Zavier confirmed the identity of the "malicious" entity lurking in the shadows.'}
{3: "It's Schulz, the one who betrayed Hanying."}
{3: "According to Villier's analysis, this mechanoid isn't just carrying its own code. It also has a bit of code that's related to Gestalt."}
{3: "That's also why Asimov couldn't find the reason for the recent attacks on Gestalt—he couldn't come to the bizarre conclusion that Gestalt was attacking itself."}
{3: 'Most importantly, Villier, now a data consciousness, has confirmed that "Schulz" also originated from the Gestalt project decades ago.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'If conditions permit, "he" can continually rewrite himself, reset to default, change his form, and even take over machines with lower intelligence levels.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Maybe "he" hurt Hanying just for his twisted amusement because "he" has always hated humans.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Moreover, "he" can also transmit his source code to other controllable machines through the electromagnetic signals from explosions, slowly infiltrating your underground city...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: 'In conclusion, that anomaly is just a piece of code.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Why did we miss this despicable scum when we were deleting data...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If we reset Huaxu without dealing with the identified intruder, there\'s a chance "he" could take over Huaxu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "What do you think I'm doing all the time? Playing house in the database?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "I'm reconstructing the source code every moment you don't notice!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Villier's tone was a bit agitated."}
{3: 'Villier understood that this leftover from the decades-old Gestalt project was closely linked to both him and his mentor, deeply connected to Gestalt itself.'}
{3: '"He" is like a ghost in the cyber world, one that "doesn\'t exist," yet holds the keys to every door.'}
{3: 'The terminal on the table with the reset command is the final trigger.'}
{3: 'But right now, deciding who should make this call, who should pull the trigger, is something no one takes lightly.'}
{2: "Villier, we're just one step away now.", 3: '68'}
{2: "What's the probability that everyone can leave safely after resetting Huaxu?", 3: '69'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Even with that robot and this "Chief Technician", I think...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "The three of us probably can't rebuild the code as quickly as he can take control of Huaxu from the core.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Essentially, "he" is still a piece of code, and his sequence in the digital world is different from ours...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just get to the point.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Fifty percent.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Almost immediately, a wave of disappointment spreads.'}
{2: "It's no different from flipping a coin.", 3: '77'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Indeed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a long exhale, he immediately picks up the communication terminal on the table.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina, can you hear me?'}
{2: 'How are things on your end? How much longer will it take?', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'About thirty minutes.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey! Teddy!', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Go stop them! Hurry!', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If you can't stop them, at least block them outside for now—", 4: '11'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '93'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The troops that arrived later, they are already setting up domain nodes!', 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Tell them to take those domain nodes and get out of this city.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A weary figure appears outside the tent, carrying someone on her back, with the equally wounded Pulao by her side.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll say it again, tell them to get out of this city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'If Babylonia decides to deploy the Longinus Arsenal against Kowloong, I will take down every single person in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu hands the girl on her back to Pulao and walks straight into the tent.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll take responsibility.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory865.jpg'}
{1: 'Kowloong', 2: 'November 10, 05:37', 4: "Three Minutes before Huaxu's Reset", 5: '1200m under Kowloong, Physical Layer of Tabula Akasha'}
{3: "Kowloong, November 10 at 05:37 AM, with just three minutes remaining until Huaxu's reset. This is taking place 1200 meters underground in Kowloong, within the Tabula Akasha physical layer."}
{3: 'Resetting Huaxu feels less tangible than rebooting the Light Wall.'}
{3: 'After all, within the Tabula Akasha, Huaxu is an intangible AI—unseen and untouchable.'}
{3: 'From this hillside, however, the effects of the reset are visible.'}
{3: 'Memory entities start to bond with the Hetero-Creatures, causing a reaction that slowly breaks down their physical forms. They revert to the Punishing Virus, their original state.'}
{3: "This process doesn't completely destroy the Hetero-Creatures, but it significantly slows their ability to regenerate."}
{3: 'The countless memory entities vanish without a trace, leaving no sign of their existence.'}
{3: 'The time spent resetting Huaxu is the final respite.'}
{3: "Because what comes next, whether it's fortune or calamity, no one knows."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu is being reset.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But this is not the ideal outcome yet.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson light of Tabula Akasha illuminates the hillside. Qu thrusts a semi-automatic rifle into the dirt before her. Surrounding her are countless shattered weapons.'}
{3: 'She stands alone amidst the graves of blades and firearms.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Do you remember their names?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You haven't experienced loss yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Those who were once everything to you might leave for a while, and they will come back in the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Until then, the only thing you can do is deceive yourself, until you end up deceiving the world as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Not just them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Not just Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But countless lives on this planet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Tabula Akasha will remember their names, forever and always.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you still clinging to Tabula Akasha?', 3: '137'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Chief, what did you see?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her cold gaze seems to pierce through everything.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen03.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The next moment, the oppressive weight from her consciousness feels like a mountain pressing down on every nerve.'}
{2: 'A forced connection?!', 3: '145'}
{3: "There's no sharp pain like when connecting with an Ascendant or Corrupted, nor the searing burn of a tainted Mind Beacon."}
{3: 'Only endless information crashing down like overwhelming waves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory875.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3601_01.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory858.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_08.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory577.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_03.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory827.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_01.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_13.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory856.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory569.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_14.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_08.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory578.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory865.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory825.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory825.jpg'}
{3: "If the state of one's M.I.N.D. mirrors the form of the Construct, then Qu's M.I.N.D. should unfold like an endless expanse of towering mountains."}
{3: 'Each mountain harbors eons of time, evolving and decaying within her consciousness. Deep within these mountains, fiery minerals are born.'}
{3: 'The echoes of countless lives reverberate among these mountains, carrying their histories, desires, and sorrows.'}
{3: 'These torrents of information, much like the mountains, exert unrelenting pressure.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_18.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_18.jpg'}
{3: 'And within these mountains stands a figure, guarding graves that are hauntingly alike.'}
{3: 'For a moment, the illusion emerged from consciousness overlaps with the Qu standing here.'}
{3: 'But it vanishes just as quickly as it appears.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory856.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory856.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront4.png', 4: '5'}
{3: 'Almost at the same time, another shadow, not belonging to her M.I.N.D., envelops the mountains.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You saw him too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "He is the one you're looking for, the entity that has invaded Kowloong besides the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront4.png', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory865.jpg'}
{2: 'Is that the code named "Schulz"?', 3: '199'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I don't care what he's called.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'He deliberately showed me his "plight" and those revolting tricks.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The other broken blade beside Qu also sinks into the soil of Tabula Akasha.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want him dead. That is what I need to do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Your M.I.N.D. and physical condition are deteriorating.', 3: '205'}
{3: 'After she came back, Liv and Fuxi from the Nighter carefully examined her to confirm her health.'}
{3: "The conclusion was that Qu's infection with the Punishing Virus was suppressed by an external force, with no signs of losing control."}
{3: 'However, because she was reactivated in an unknown manner, some of her Construct functions remain blocked by the special bullet fired by Duheng.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'That is no longer your concern.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But he is just a piece of code.', 3: '210'}
{2: "We can't kill something from the virtual world in reality.", 3: '211'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'My fate is to protect Kowloong and Tabula Akasha at all costs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want him dead, whether he has rejected death or truly lived.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I... will make it happen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen03.prefab'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the oppressive mountains in your consciousness recede as Qu severs the forced connection.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You have matured.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu turns around, still standing amidst the graves, merging with the shattered Tabula Akasha into an eternal sunset.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Remember all of this, 【kuroname】. Remember me, remember us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'This is the last thing you can do here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What happens next, Kowloong must handle on its own.', 4: '1'}
